benchmark_details.name: Feriji: A French-Zarma Parallel Corpus, Glossary & Translator
benchmark_details.overview: Feriji is the first robust French-Zarma parallel corpus and glossary designed for machine translation, containing 61,085 sentences in Zarma and 42,789 in French, aiming to address the lack of resources for Zarma language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide resources for machine translation and promote the Zarma language.

data.source: Data collected from various sources including religious texts and original stories generated using ChatGPT, followed by alignment and cleaning.
data.size: 61,085 sentences in Zarma, 42,789 sentences in French, 4,062 glossary entries
data.annotation: Aligned entries manually reviewed by Zarma speakers.

methodology.calculation: BLEU score calculated to evaluate translation performance.
methodology.interpretation: Higher BLEU scores indicate better translation quality.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation conducted to assess translation quality.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Ensured through sourcing materials that are publicly available or used with explicit permission.
